mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_REGDATE, BOARD_FILE, BOARD_HASH, BOARD_VIEW FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CATE='SH' AND BOARD_NYN='Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT BOARD_NO, ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_REGDATE, BOARD_FILE, BOARD_HASH, BOARD_VIEW FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CATE='EX' AND BOARD_NYN='Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT LAST_NUMBER FROM USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME = 'BOARD_SEQ'
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_NYN='Y' WHERE BOARD_NYN='N' AND BOARD_NO=#{board_no}
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_NYN='N' WHERE BOARD_NYN='Y' AND BOARD_NO=#{board_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_NO, BOARD_CATE, ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_REGDATE, BOARD_NYN, BOARD_FILE, BOARD_HASH) VALUES(BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{board_cate}, #{id}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, SYSDATE, 'N', ' ', #{board_hash})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM COMMENTS WHERE COM_PNO=#{com_pno} ORDER BY COM_REGDATE

SELECT BOARD_NO, ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_REGDATE, BOARD_FILE, BOARD_HASH, BOARD_VIEW FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_REGDATE, BOARD_FILE, BOARD_HASH, BOARD_VIEW, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) AS RNUM FROM BOARD WHERE 1=1 AND BOARD_CATE='SH' AND BOARD_NYN='N'
) B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(BOARD_NO) FROM BOARD WHERE 1=1 AND BOARD_CATE='SH' AND BOARD_NYN='N'
AND BOARD_NO > 0
